intro_only_event_multi_anniversary_count:
A huge celebration’s happening soon
on Pasio!

I wonder what they’re planning! Maybe
a competition to determine the strongest
Trainer?!

It’d be neat if it’s a festival like Kitakami’s
Festival of Masks!

No matter what it is, I’m sure it’ll be a blast!
Let’s go make some memories!
We’ve lots to prepare for the big event!
I wanna make enough curry for everyone!

We’ll need a lot of ingredients...not to
mention a big enough pot!

Er... Just how much curry are you two
planning to make?
The celebration’s about to begin!

Everyone from Alola loves festivals,
so they’re SUPER excited!

I wanna hype the event by riding Tauros
with my gramps!

Oooh, Tauros riding?! If it’s a competition,
we won’t lose!

Heya! You two are headed to the celebration
happening here on Pasio, right?
Yup! I can’t decide what to wear!

You’ll look great no matter what you wear,
Serena.

I hope there’s fireworks so we can all watch
them together!
It’s fun when Pasio’s buzzing with activity...
But what exactly are we celebrating?
I hope they hold a tag battle tournament!

I don’t know what’s in store, but whatever
it is, I’m giving it all I’ve got!

I hear a huge celebration is happening soon
on Pasio!

Maybe they plan to bring in Trainers
stronger than we’ve ever seen!
No matter who we battle...

our dream team’s not going to lose. Not with
the way we three work together!

Everyone seems busy preparing for the
celebration.
I wonder what we’re celebrating.

Maybe we’ll get to see something rare and
pretty, like the Litleonids!

If so, I bet it’ll be a lasting memory for all
of us!
A celebration on Pasio, huh.

It’d be nice if it’s an event we can all
enjoy together with our Pokémon, like
a Pokéathlon!

Yeah, that’d be neat! I bet we’d see a lot
of different emotions from the people and
Pokémon participating!

Everyone’s having a blast and working with
their Pokémon to polish up on battling!

I guess you’re raring to go, Red...
But just so you know, I’m not losing to you!
